casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of L.M. (Child) and G.J. (Mother) and A.M. (Father); G.J (Mother) and A.M. (Father), Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Plaintiff Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-619 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED August 27, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

MAY , J.

Affirmed.

BAKER, J., Concurs.

ROBB, J., Concurs.
